entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h overnight. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then clearing. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM AST Thursday 12 January 2023
